page.title: 20FINZEAN POPULATION:1985.
page.content: The population of Finzean is{286 }, an {increase of 65 since 1972,}since when the no of households has increased from{72 to 108.}Finzean is a very desirable place in which to live and, with the increase in car ownership, commuters find it feasible to travel as far as Aberdeen daily.{In 1972 {there were 16 commuters: now 55. Shopping in supermarkets outwith Finzean being popular, there is only one local shop, containing the PO.{A {free bus runs twice weekly to the Fine {Fare supermarket}at Bridge of Dee. The local shop offers tourists wooden articles crafted at the local turning mill and honey. {One- family businesses}are painter/ decorator,joiner/decorator and scrap merchant.Bed and breakfast or caravans are available to tourists.
